question: What is the theme of the 2019 World Haemophilia Day (WHD)?
option2: Treatment for All, The Vision of All
explanation: The World Haemophilia Day (WHD) is observed every year on April 17  to increase awareness of haemophilia and other inherited bleeding disorders. The 2019  theme ‘Outreach and Identification’, encourages people to meet and connect with other people who have had similar experiences, and what it is like.It will be observed with the slogan – ‘Reaching Out: The First Step to Care’. Haemophilia is an inherited genetic disorder that impairs the body\'s ability to form clots. This condition is dangerous as it can cause excessive loss of blood in case of injuries, easy bruising, and also bleeding between joints and in the brain. Haemophilia can only be managed but does not have a cure.
